named-query.name: Styling.findJPQL
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM Styling t WHERE t.style.sid = :sid

named-native-query.name: style_products.findSQL
named-native-query.query: SELECT s.*,p.pid,p.name FROM style_products sp, style s, product p WHERE s.sid = :sid AND s.sid = sp.sid AND sp.pid = p.pid
